attributes.description:
Experience legendary Toughness!

South Africa’s favourite bakkie is back and tougher than ever! This bakkie with its improved 2.8-litre diesel engine and new fearlessly bold styling was made for those who seek adventure, who want to get the job done and will do whatever it takes to achieve that. For work, play and everything in between, experience the Hilux.

All trade ins are welcomed. In house finance is available. Nationwide delivery can be arranged.
